rows.label: tlk45370154_03_msg0001
rows.name:
One industry which Superbia
supports heavily is the salvaging trade.

rows.label: tlk45370154_03_msg0002
rows.name:
This is because salvaged materials
are invaluable both for military use
and as a profitable export.

rows.label: tlk45370154_03_msg0003
rows.name:
However, the nation's salvaging
activities are not centered here in
the capital.

rows.label: tlk45370154_03_msg0004
rows.name:
There's a port town called Chilsain on
the Divine Beast's right shoulder where most
of the salvaging used to take place.

rows.label: tlk45370154_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I say "used to" because we've received
word that Chilsain was razed beyond
recovery by those attacks from the sky.

rows.label: tlk45370154_03_msg0006
rows.name:
There was a large fortress there, and a
major military port... I fear many proud
Superbian lives must have been lost.
